meanings.sent1: The sheathers carefully covered the sword with a protective sheath.
meanings.sent2: The skilled sheathers in the workshop were busy crafting leather covers for the knives.
meanings.sent3: The sheathers at the costume party were dressed as knights with cardboard sword sheaths.
meanings.sent4: Her words acted as sheathers, protecting him from the harsh criticism.
meanings.sent5: The sheathers shielded the delicate flower from the strong wind, ensuring its safety.

meanings.sent1: The sheathers of the sword required precision and care.
meanings.sent2: The sheathers of the documents were done quickly to protect them from damage.
meanings.sent3: The sheathers of the cake with frosting made it look like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The sheathers of the tree branches created a beautiful canopy overhead.
meanings.sent5: The sheathers of the book covers kept them looking new and pristine.

meanings.definition: The material used to make a sheath.
meanings.sent1: The leather sheathers were soft to the touch.
meanings.sent2: The metal sheathers were durable and long-lasting.
meanings.sent3: The plastic sheathers for the cables were bright red in color.
meanings.sent4: The fabric sheathers for the tools were easy to clean and maintain.
meanings.sent5: The wooden sheathers were intricately carved with beautiful designs.
